channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Names EJ Antoni New BLS Commissioner
item.description: President Trump fired the Bureau of Labor Statistics chief earlier this month after a downbeat jobs report. The move has raised concerns about the cre...

item.title: The D.C. Takeover
item.description: We look at crime in the nation’s capital and President Trump’s legal authority to intervene.

item.title: As Heat Wave Hits Southern Europe, Wildfires Kill 2

item.title: The D.N.C.’s New Leader Seeks to Curb Dark Money Influence in 2028 Primaries
item.description: The move is the first significant maneuver from Ken Martin to shape the party’s next presidential nominating process, but how much bite his proposal c...

item.title: The hidden costs of cutting Medicaid
item.description: Cutting Medicaid can seem like an easy way to slash the budget. But, the costs can spread to all of us.

item.title: Sheila Jordan, Fearless Vocal Improviser, Is Dead at 96
item.description: She was revered in the jazz world as a chance taker who communicated an effervescent joy in the pure act of singing.

item.title: Why lung cancer is a 'hidden epidemic' in this part of the world
item.description: Rates of the world's deadliest cancer appear to be low in sub-Saharan Africa. But that statistic is masking the scope of the disease, doctors say.

item.title: Inflation remains elevated as Trump's tariffs take hold

item.title: Alaska was once a full-fledged Russian colony. Now it's hosting a U.S.-Russia summit
item.description: Russia lost a war in Crimea in the 1850s. To pay off war debts, Russia sold Alaska to the U.S. Now presidents Trump and Putin will meet Friday in Alas...

item.title: Wildfires Rage in Spain as Temperatures Soar
item.description: Nearly 1,000 soldiers have been deployed to battle wildfires. Spain’s meteorological agency has issued red-level “extreme risk” alerts for five region...

item.title: Trump Says He’s Going to Alaska to See What Putin ‘Has in Mind’
item.description: President Trump set a low bar for his summit with President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia, saying he was ready to walk away if no deal was forthcoming.

item.title: Perpetrator in 1975 Iceland Bank Theft Comes Forward, 50 Years Later
item.description: Baskets of coins disappeared overnight from an Icelandic bank in 1975. Last month, someone finally owned up.
